text: Kerstin Birgitta Rasmusson, (4 September 1939 â€“ 5 March 2021) was a Swedish television personality, baker and author. Between 2012 and 2019, she was a judge on Hela Sverige bakar, which was broadcast on TV4. She reprised the role for its celebrity version. Rasmusson was born in Ljungskile, Sweden. Rasmusson died on 5 March 2021 in Stockholm, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish television personalities Category:Swedish writers Category:Bankers
title: Birgitta Rasmusson
